meanings.definition: The quality or state of being sour.
meanings.sent1: The sourness of the lemon made my face scrunch up.
meanings.sent2: I could taste the sourness of the vinegar in the salad dressing.
meanings.sent3: The sourness of the milk was a surprise in my morning coffee.
meanings.sent4: Her words had a sourness that lingered in the air long after she left.
meanings.sent5: The sourness of the unripe fruit was a shock to my taste buds.

meanings.definition: A sharp, biting taste or smell.
meanings.sent1: The sourness of the pickles was too intense for my liking.
meanings.sent2: The sourness of the spoiled milk was unmistakable.
meanings.sent3: The sourness of the cheese hit me as soon as I opened the fridge.
meanings.sent4: The sourness of the wine left a lingering bitterness on my tongue.
meanings.sent5: The sourness of the apple cider vinegar made my eyes water.
